panels.description: This query is calculating the ratio of plays with > 1% of rebuffering events to the total nimber of plays within this sessions.

targets.rawQuery:
WITH rebuffering_sessions
AS (
    SELECT cmcd_sid AS plays
           ,BIN(time, ${interval}) AS bin_time
           ,CASE WHEN count_if(cmcd_bs) >= 0.01 * count (x_edge_request_id) THEN 'BS' ELSE 'NO-BS' END as BS
    FROM $__database.$__table
    WHERE $__timeFilter
          AND cmcd_sid IS NOT NULL
          AND c_country IN (${country:singlequote})
          AND x_edge_location IN (${edge_location:singlequote})
          AND cs_protocol_version IN (${protocol_version:singlequote})
          AND cs_protocol IN (${protocol:singlequote})
          AND 'true' IN (${device:csv})
          AND x_host_header IN (${distribution:singlequote})
          AND cmcd_sf IN (${streaming_format:singlequote})
    GROUP BY BIN(time, ${interval}), cmcd_sid
)
SELECT bin_time
      ,ROUND(COUNT (CASE WHEN BS = 'BS' THEN 1 ELSE Null END) / (1.0 * NULLIF(COUNT (plays), 0)) * 100) as rebuffering_ratio
FROM rebuffering_sessions
GROUP BY bin_time
ORDER BY bin_time DESC

panels.title: Rebuffering Sessions

targets.rawQuery:
WITH rebuffering_events AS (
      SELECT time
            ,cmcd_bs
            ,x_edge_request_id
            ,x_edge_detailed_result_type AS detailed_result_type 
            ,LAG(x_edge_detailed_result_type, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time) as detailed_result_type_prev
            ,LAG(sc_status, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time) as http_status_prev
      FROM $__database.$__table
      WHERE $__timeFilter
            AND cmcd_sid is not Null
            AND c_country IN (${country:singlequote})
            AND x_edge_location IN (${edge_location:singlequote})
            AND cs_protocol_version IN (${protocol_version:singlequote})
            AND cs_protocol IN (${protocol:singlequote})
            AND 'true' IN (${device:csv})
            AND x_host_header IN (${distribution:singlequote})
            AND cmcd_sf IN (${streaming_format:singlequote})
)

SELECT COUNT (CASE WHEN cmcd_bs = true THEN 1 ELSE Null END)
      ,BIN(time, ${interval})  
FROM rebuffering_events
WHERE detailed_result_type_prev IN (${result_type:singlequote}, Null)
      AND http_status_prev IN (${status_code:singlequote}, Null)
GROUP BY BIN(time, ${interval}) 
ORDER BY BIN(time, ${interval}) DESC

WITH rebuffering_events AS (
      SELECT time
            ,cmcd_bs
            ,x_edge_request_id
            ,x_edge_detailed_result_type AS detailed_result_type 
            ,LAG(x_edge_detailed_result_type, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time) as detailed_result_type_prev
            ,LAG(sc_status, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time) as http_status_prev
      FROM $__database.$__table
      WHERE $__timeFilter
            AND cmcd_sid is not Null
            AND c_country IN (${country:singlequote})
            AND x_edge_location IN (${edge_location:singlequote})
            AND cs_protocol_version IN (${protocol_version:singlequote})
            AND cs_protocol IN (${protocol:singlequote})
            AND 'true' IN (${device:csv})
            AND x_host_header IN (${distribution:singlequote})
            AND cmcd_sf IN (${streaming_format:singlequote})
)

SELECT COUNT (CASE WHEN cmcd_bs = true THEN 1 ELSE Null END) / (1.0 * COUNT(x_edge_request_id)) * 100 as rebuffering_events
      ,BIN(time, ${interval})  
FROM rebuffering_events
WHERE detailed_result_type_prev IN (${result_type:singlequote}, Null)
      AND http_status_prev IN (${status_code:singlequote}, Null)
GROUP BY BIN(time, ${interval}) 
ORDER BY BIN(time, ${interval}) DESC

WITH CTE AS (
      SELECT time
             ,cmcd_sid
            --,CASE WHEN cmcd_bs=true THEN LAG(cmcd_bs, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time)  END as prev_cmcd_bs
	      ,CASE WHEN cmcd_bs=true THEN LAG(x_edge_request_id, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time)  END AS CF_request_id
            ,CASE WHEN cmcd_bs=true THEN LAG(regexp_replace(cs_uri_stem, '\?(.*)'), 1) OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time) END AS uri
            ,CASE WHEN cmcd_bs=true THEN LAG(cmcd_mtp, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time) END AS throughput
            ,CASE WHEN cmcd_bs=true THEN LAG(x_edge_detailed_result_type, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time) END AS result_type
            ,CASE WHEN cmcd_bs=true THEN LAG(c_ip, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time) END AS client_ip
            ,CASE WHEN cmcd_bs=true THEN LAG(sc_status, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time) END AS http_code
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE $__timeFilter
      AND cmcd_sid is not Null
      AND c_country IN (${country:singlequote})
      AND x_edge_location IN (${edge_location:singlequote})
      AND cs_protocol_version IN (${protocol_version:singlequote})
      AND cs_protocol IN (${protocol:singlequote})
      AND 'true' IN (${device:csv})
      AND x_host_header IN (${distribution:singlequote})
      AND cmcd_sf IN (${streaming_format:singlequote})
)

SELECT time, cmcd_sid, CF_request_id, uri, throughput, result_type, http_code, client_ip
FROM CTE
WHERE CF_request_id is not null
      AND http_code IN (${status_code:singlequote})
      AND result_type IN (${result_type:singlequote})
ORDER BY time DESC

panels.description: Number of Rebuffering Sessions vs TTFB for Cache Hit

targets.rawQuery:
WITH rebuffering_sessions AS (
      SELECT cmcd_sid AS plays
            ,bin(time, ${interval}) AS bin_time
            ,CASE WHEN count_if(cmcd_bs) >= 0.01 * count (x_edge_request_id) THEN 'BS' ELSE 'NO-BS' END as BS
      FROM $__database.$__table
      WHERE $__timeFilter
            AND cmcd_sid IS NOT NULL
            AND c_country IN (${country:singlequote})
            AND x_edge_location IN (${edge_location:singlequote})
            AND cs_protocol_version IN (${protocol_version:singlequote})
            AND cs_protocol IN (${protocol:singlequote})
            AND 'true' IN (${device:csv})
            AND x_host_header IN (${distribution:singlequote})
            AND cmcd_sf IN (${streaming_format:singlequote})
GROUP BY bin(time, ${interval}), cmcd_sid
)
SELECT bin_time
      ,ROUND(COUNT (CASE WHEN BS = 'BS' THEN 1 ELSE Null END) / (1.0 * NULLIF(COUNT (plays), 0)) * 100) as rebuffering_ratio
FROM rebuffering_sessions
GROUP BY bin_time
ORDER BY bin_time DESC

WITH TTFB AS (
      SELECT bin(time, ${interval}) AS bin_time
            ,avg(time_to_first_byte) AS ttfb
      FROM $__database.$__table
      WHERE $__timeFilter
            AND c_country IN (${country:singlequote})
            AND x_edge_location IN (${edge_location:singlequote})
            AND cs_protocol_version IN (${protocol_version:singlequote})
            AND cs_protocol IN (${protocol:singlequote})
            AND x_edge_detailed_result_type = 'Hit'
      GROUP BY bin(time, ${interval})
)
SELECT bin_time
      ,ttfb AS ttfb
      ,avg(ttfb) OVER (
		ORDER BY bin_time range BETWEEN unbounded preceding AND CURRENT row
	) AS moving_ttfb
FROM TTFB
ORDER BY bin_time DESC

panels.title: Rebuffering Sessions vs  TTFB: HIT

panels.description: Number of Rebuffering Sessions vs  TTFB for Cache Miss

targets.rawQuery:
WITH rebuffering_sessions AS (
      SELECT cmcd_sid as plays
            ,bin(time, ${interval}) AS bin_time
            ,CASE WHEN count_if(cmcd_bs) >= 0.01 * count (x_edge_request_id) THEN 'BS' ELSE 'NO-BS' END as BS
      FROM $__database.$__table
      WHERE $__timeFilter
            AND cmcd_sid IS NOT NULL
            AND c_country IN (${country:singlequote})
            AND x_edge_location IN (${edge_location:singlequote})
            AND cs_protocol_version IN (${protocol_version:singlequote})
            AND cs_protocol IN (${protocol:singlequote})
            AND 'true' IN (${device:csv})
            AND x_host_header IN (${distribution:singlequote})
            AND cmcd_sf IN (${streaming_format:singlequote})
      GROUP BY bin(time, ${interval}), cmcd_sid
)
SELECT bin_time
      ,ROUND(COUNT (CASE WHEN BS = 'BS' THEN 1 ELSE Null END) / (1.0 * NULLIF(COUNT (plays), 0)) * 100) as rebuffering_ratio
FROM rebuffering_sessions
GROUP BY bin_time
ORDER BY bin_time DESC

WITH TTFB AS (
      SELECT bin(time, ${interval}) AS bin_time
            ,avg(time_to_first_byte) AS ttfb
      FROM $__database.$__table
      WHERE $__timeFilter
            --AND x_edge_detailed_result_type IN ('Miss', 'OriginConnectError', 'OriginContentRangeLengthError',
            --    'OriginDnsError', 'OriginError', 'OriginHeaderTooBigError', 'OriginInvalidResponseError',
            --    'OriginReadError', 'OriginZeroSizeObjectError')
            AND x_edge_detailed_result_type IN ('Miss')
            AND c_country IN (${country:singlequote})
            AND x_edge_location IN (${edge_location:singlequote})
            AND cs_protocol_version IN (${protocol_version:singlequote})
            AND cs_protocol IN (${protocol:singlequote})
      GROUP BY bin(time, ${interval})
)
SELECT bin_time
      ,ttfb AS ttfb
      ,avg(ttfb) OVER (
		ORDER BY bin_time range BETWEEN unbounded preceding AND CURRENT row
	) AS moving_ttfb
FROM TTFB
ORDER BY bin_time DESC

panels.title: Rebuffering Sessions vs TTFB: MISS

panels.description: Number of Rebuffering Sessions vs TTFB Rate of Change

targets.rawQuery:
WITH rebuffering_sessions
AS (
    SELECT cmcd_sid AS plays
           ,BIN(time, ${interval}) AS bin_time
           ,CASE WHEN count_if(cmcd_bs) >= 0.01 * count (x_edge_request_id) THEN 'BS' ELSE 'NO-BS' END AS BS
    FROM $__database.$__table
    WHERE $__timeFilter
          AND cmcd_sid IS NOT NULL
          AND c_country IN (${country:singlequote})
          AND x_edge_location IN (${edge_location:singlequote})
          AND cs_protocol_version IN (${protocol_version:singlequote})
          AND cs_protocol IN (${protocol:singlequote})
          AND 'true' IN (${device:csv})
          AND x_host_header IN (${distribution:singlequote})
          AND cmcd_sf IN (${streaming_format:singlequote})
    GROUP BY BIN(time, ${interval}), cmcd_sid
)
SELECT bin_time
      ,ROUND(COUNT (CASE WHEN BS = 'BS' THEN 1 ELSE Null END) / (1.0 * NULLIF(COUNT (plays), 0)) * 100) AS rebuffering_ratio
FROM rebuffering_sessions
GROUP BY bin_time
ORDER BY bin_time DESC

WITH TTFB AS (
SELECT bin(time, ${interval}) AS bin_time, avg(time_to_first_byte) AS ttfb
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE $__timeFilter
       AND c_country IN (${country:singlequote})
       AND x_edge_detailed_result_type IN (${result_type:singlequote})
       AND cs_protocol_version IN (${protocol_version:singlequote})
       AND cs_protocol IN (${protocol:singlequote})
       AND x_edge_detailed_result_type = 'Hit'
GROUP BY bin(time, ${interval})
ORDER BY bin_time
)
SELECT derivative_linear(CREATE_TIME_SERIES(bin_time, ttfb), ${interval}) AS rateOfChange
--non_negative_derivative_linear
FROM TTFB

panels.title: Rebuffering Sessions vs Rate of Change TTFB: HIT

      ,ROUND(COUNT (CASE WHEN BS = 'BS' THEN 1 ELSE Null END) / (1.0 * NULLIF(COUNT (plays), 0)) * 100) AS rebuffering_ratio

SELECT bin(time, ${interval}) AS bin_time, avg(time_to_first_byte) AS ttfb

panels.title: Rebuffering Sessions vs Rate of Change TTFB: MISS

panels.description: Number of Rebuffering Sessions vs Measured Throughput

targets.rawQuery:
WITH rebuffering_sessions AS (
      SELECT cmcd_sid as plays
            ,bin(time, ${interval}) AS bin_time
            ,CASE WHEN count_if(cmcd_bs) >= 0.01 * count (x_edge_request_id) THEN 'BS' ELSE 'NO-BS' END AS BS
      FROM $__database.$__table
      WHERE $__timeFilter
            AND cmcd_sid IS NOT NULL
            AND c_country IN (${country:singlequote})
            AND x_edge_location IN (${edge_location:singlequote})
            AND cs_protocol_version IN (${protocol_version:singlequote})
            AND cs_protocol IN (${protocol:singlequote})
            AND 'true' IN (${device:csv})
            AND x_host_header IN (${distribution:singlequote})
            AND cmcd_sf IN (${streaming_format:singlequote})
      GROUP BY bin(time, ${interval}), cmcd_sid
)
SELECT bin_time
      ,ROUND(COUNT (CASE WHEN BS = 'BS' THEN 1 ELSE Null END) / (1.0 * NULLIF(COUNT (plays), 0)) * 100) as rebuffering_ratio
FROM rebuffering_sessions
GROUP BY bin_time
ORDER BY bin_time DESC

WITH CTE AS (
SELECT 
        time
       ,CASE WHEN LAG(x_edge_detailed_result_type, 1)  OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time) = 'Hit' THEN LAG(cmcd_mtp, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time) END as mtp_hit
       ,CASE WHEN LAG(x_edge_detailed_result_type, 1)  OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time) = 'Miss' THEN LAG(cmcd_mtp, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY cmcd_sid ORDER BY time) END as mtp_miss
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE $__timeFilter
      AND c_country IN (${country:singlequote})
      AND x_edge_location IN (${edge_location:singlequote})
      AND cs_protocol_version IN (${protocol_version:singlequote})
      AND cs_protocol IN (${protocol:singlequote})
)

SELECT bin(time, ${interval}) AS bin_time
       ,avg(mtp_hit) AS mtp_hit_avg
       ,avg(mtp_miss) AS mtp_miss_avg
FROM CTE
GROUP BY bin(time, ${interval})
ORDER BY bin(time, ${interval}) DESC

panels.title: Rebuffering Sessions vs MTP

targets.rawQuery:
SELECT cs_uri_stem, $__database.$__table.*
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE $__timeFilter
        AND c_country IN (${country:singlequote})
        AND 'true' IN (${device:csv})
        AND x_host_header IN (${distribution:singlequote})
        AND cmcd_sf IN (${streaming_format:singlequote})
        AND x_edge_detailed_result_type IN (${result_type:singlequote})
        AND cs_protocol_version IN (${protocol_version:singlequote})
        AND cs_protocol IN (${protocol:singlequote})
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 100

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT (c_country), count(*) AS CNT
FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE $__timeFilter
GROUP BY c_country
ORDER BY CNT DESC
list.label: Country
list.name: country
list.query:

FROM $__database.$__table
WHERE $__timeFilter
GROUP BY c_country
ORDER BY CNT DESC
